# Panorama device group and template configuration

device-group {
    enterprise-firewalls {
        description "Production enterprise firewalls";
        devices {
            012345678901234;
            012345678901235;
        }
        pre-rulebase {
            security {
                rules {
                    global-block-malware {
                        description "Block known malware globally";
                        from any;
                        to any;
                        source any;
                        destination any;
                        application apt1;
                        application apt-backdoor;
                        action deny;
                        log-end yes;
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        post-rulebase {
            security {
                rules {
                    default-deny {
                        description "Global default deny";
                        from any;
                        to any;
                        source any;
                        destination any;
                        application any;
                        service any;
                        action deny;
                        log-end yes;
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        address {
            corporate-network {
                ip-netmask 10.0.0.0/8;
            }
            cloud-network {
                ip-netmask 172.16.0.0/12;
            }
        }
    }
    branch-firewalls {
        description "Branch office firewalls";
    }
}

template {
    enterprise-template {
        description "Standard enterprise firewall template";
        settings {
            default-vsys vsys1;
        }
        config {
            deviceconfig {
                system {
                    timezone UTC;
                    dns-setting {
                        servers {
                            primary 10.0.0.53;
                        }
                    }
                    ntp-servers {
                        primary-ntp-server {
                            ntp-server-address 10.0.0.123;
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

template-stack {
    enterprise-stack {
        templates enterprise-template;
        devices {
            012345678901234;
            012345678901235;
        }
    }
}

shared {
    address {
        rfc1918-10 {
            ip-netmask 10.0.0.0/8;
            description "RFC1918 Class A private";
        }
        rfc1918-172 {
            ip-netmask 172.16.0.0/12;
            description "RFC1918 Class B private";
        }
        rfc1918-192 {
            ip-netmask 192.168.0.0/16;
            description "RFC1918 Class C private";
        }
    }
    address-group {
        all-rfc1918 {
            static {
                rfc1918-10;
                rfc1918-172;
                rfc1918-192;
            }
            description "All RFC1918 private address space";
        }
    }
    service {
        custom-rdp {
            protocol tcp;
            port 3389;
            description "Remote Desktop Protocol";
        }
        custom-ssh {
            protocol tcp;
            port 22;
            description "Secure Shell";
        }
    }
}
